hexsky.entry.ship_spells.entry: Welcome to Navimancy. The art of manipulating ships.$(br)Some important keywords before we start.$(li)$(thing)Force$() is a $(l:patterns/spells/basic#hexcasting:add_motion)impulse$() in a specific direction.$(li)$(thing)Torque$() is like force. but instead of being in a direction it is spin.$(li)$(thing)Variant$() a Variant force is one that is based on the ships axis.$(li)$(thing)Invariant$() a Invariant force is applied based on the worlds axis$()
hexsky.page.ship_spells.p2s: takes a posisition and gets the ship it is apart of. if it is not $(l:patterns/spells/ship#hexsky:cloak)cloaked$()
hexsky.page.ship_spells.cloak: toggles the ship's cloak and returns the ship's cloak state
hexsky.page.ship_spells.ship_pos: functions like $(l:patterns/basics#hexcasting:entity_pos/eye)Compass Purification$() but instead returns the center of mass of the ship
hexsky.page.ship_spells.ship_rot: functions like $(l:patterns/basics#hexcasting:get_entity_look)Alidade's Purification$() but gets the ships $(l:patterns/spells/ship)forward$() direction
hexsky.page.ship_spells.ship_weight: returns the total weight of the ship.$(br)Usually forces on the ship are multiplied by the mass of a ship
hexsky.page.ship_spells.zone_ships: functions like $(l:patterns/entity#hexcasting:zone_entity)Zone Distillation$() but instead returns a list of ships near the position if they are not $(l:patterns/spells/ship#hexsky:cloak)cloaked$()
hexsky.page.ship_spells.assemble: takes a list of blocks and assembles them into a ship. blocks outside of ambit are ignored
hexsky.page.ship_spells.force_variant: Applies a $(thing)Variant Force$() to the ship in the specified direction
hexsky.page.ship_spells.torque_variant: Applies a $(thing)Variant Torque$() to the ship in the specified direction
hexsky.page.ship_spells.force_invariant: Applies a $(thing)Invariant Force$() to the ship in the specified direction
hexsky.page.ship_spells.torque_invariant: Applies a $(thing)Invariant Torque$() to the ship in the specified direction
hexsky.page.ship_spells.force_invariant_: Applies a $(thing)Invariant Force$() to the ship in the specified direction with a specified offset from the $(l:patterns/spells/ship#hexsky:ship_pos)center of mass$()
hexsky.page.ship_spells.force_variant_po: Applies a $(thing)Variant Force$() to the ship in the specified direction with a specified offset from the $(l:patterns/spells/ship#hexsky:ship_pos)center of mass$()
